overall_assessment: The Core Web Vitals educational demo has a clean, functional design with good educational content. The purple gradient background and tab navigation work well, but there are opportunities to improve visual hierarchy, accessibility, interactivity, and mobile responsiveness.

suggestions.title: Improve visual hierarchy and content spacing
suggestions.description: The content sections feel cramped with insufficient whitespace between elements. The demo areas (browser mockups) need better visual separation from explanatory text.
suggestions.rationale: Better spacing and hierarchy will improve readability and help users focus on the interactive demonstrations, which are the key learning tools.

suggestions.title: Enhance keyboard navigation and focus indicators
suggestions.description: Tab navigation buttons lack clear focus indicators, and the interactive demo buttons need better accessibility support with ARIA labels and roles.
suggestions.rationale: Educational content should be accessible to all users, including those using keyboard navigation or screen readers.

suggestions.title: Add visual feedback for interactive elements
suggestions.description: Demo buttons (Start FCP Demo, Start LCP Demo, etc.) need hover states, loading states, and better visual feedback when clicked.
suggestions.rationale: Users need clear feedback that their interactions are being processed, especially in performance demonstrations where timing is crucial.

suggestions.title: Improve color contrast for accessibility
suggestions.description: Some text on the purple gradient background may not meet WCAG AA contrast requirements. Code blocks need better syntax highlighting and contrast.
suggestions.rationale: Proper contrast ensures readability for users with visual impairments and in various lighting conditions.

suggestions.title: Optimize mobile and tablet experience
suggestions.description: Tab navigation appears cramped on smaller screens. Demo areas and browser mockups need responsive redesign for mobile devices.
suggestions.rationale: Many users will access this educational content on mobile devices, and web performance is especially critical on mobile.

suggestions.title: Enhance typography hierarchy and readability
suggestions.description: Font sizes and weights need better differentiation between headings, body text, and code examples. Line height could be improved for better readability.
suggestions.rationale: Clear typography hierarchy helps users navigate the educational content more effectively and improves comprehension.

suggestions.title: Redesign performance threshold indicators
suggestions.description: The Good/Needs Improvement/Poor cards are effective but could benefit from icons, better visual metaphors, and consistent sizing.
suggestions.rationale: These cards are key to understanding performance thresholds - they should be highly visual and memorable.

suggestions.title: Enhance demo interactivity and progress indicators
suggestions.description: Add progress bars for loading demonstrations, real-time metrics display during demos, and the ability to repeat demos easily.
suggestions.rationale: More interactive feedback helps users understand the concepts better and keeps them engaged with the learning material.

suggestions.title: Improve browser mockup design
suggestions.description: The browser window mockups in demos need more realistic styling with proper chrome, URL bars, and loading indicators to enhance the simulation experience.
suggestions.rationale: Realistic browser mockups make the performance demonstrations more relatable and help users connect the concepts to real websites.

suggestions.title: Add semantic color coding throughout
suggestions.description: Use consistent color coding for different metric types (loading=blue, interactivity=green, stability=orange) throughout the application.
suggestions.rationale: Consistent color associations help users build mental models and quickly identify related content across different sections.

suggestions.title: Add breadcrumb navigation
suggestions.description: Include breadcrumb navigation or progress indicator showing current section and overall progress through the guide.
suggestions.rationale: Helps users understand their position in the learning journey and provides context for the educational flow.

suggestions.title: Add tooltips and contextual help
suggestions.description: Include hover tooltips for technical terms and expandable help sections for complex concepts.
suggestions.rationale: Educational content benefits from progressive disclosure and contextual help for learners at different levels.

suggestions.title: Enhance code example presentation
suggestions.description: Code blocks need better syntax highlighting, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and expandable/collapsible sections for longer examples.
suggestions.rationale: Developers learning about Core Web Vitals need easy access to implementable code examples.

suggestions.title: Add skip navigation links
suggestions.description: Include skip links to main content and navigation sections for screen reader users.
suggestions.rationale: Improves navigation efficiency for assistive technology users in this multi-tab educational interface.
